title: Wish Dragon
description: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

reviews.text: Completely in love with the movie. Very detailed and exaggerated animations lead to some very genius performances.
With a completely different moral of the story in comparison to Aladdin, Wish Dragon is pretty funny and has a good emotional core.
Very good movie. It idd reminds me of Aladdin, but that is a good thing. If critics give it a mower score for it, i definitely do NOT agree with them
Cool and entertaining movie with quite good story, definitely worth watching.
Great movie, almost Pixar level. I've heard that it's been compared to Aladdin which is why it has low review scores but I dont think that should affect the ratings at all

As a Chinese Australian I absolutely loved the entire movie. The characters were dynamic, the story pacing had great rythm, and this was the first animated movie that I felt truly represented Chinese characters well. I also watched this is Mandarin for added nostalgic effect.
admirable[ ad-mer-uh-buhl ]adjectiveworthy of admiration; inspiring approval, reverence, or affection.
I loved this movie way more than I expected to, definitely worth checking out.
this movie is good, i like the story and the visual anime, sony animation is better
There are some genuine funny moments in this. It’s a mediocre movie all around but it certainly isn’t a bad movie.
